block.p: LEAD: The Voters Are Watching Despite talk of apathy, more Americans say they are paying a lot of attention to this Presidential campaign than in 1984. Page A15. Decline in New York's Poor Researchers see signs that the city's economic growth is helping some poor people. Many others stay mired in poverty, they say.
